quote: Your social media strategy is not so much catching lightning in a bottle as it is a constant process of trial and error.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to focus on consistency and learning rather than perfection.
suggested_hook: Why your social media doesn't need to be perfect to succeed.

quote: The best platform for you is the one you're already using the most.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the idea that agents need to be on every platform.
suggested_hook: Stop worrying about being everywhere on social media.
